name: MINECRAFT IMPACT VR (JOKE)
description:
unserious point-and-click minigame made at 5am about exploring Mondstadt, being confused, and restoring your broken game. featuring diluc, razor and venti

made for a school project, based on a dumb idea of fusing Genshin Impact and Minecraft together

controls:

alt hold + left click to look around

esc to pause (pause menu non-functional lmaoo)

buttons on top right in order: restart, help, exit

installation:

just extract the zip. file into a folder and play the exe. file

now i will eat ice cream
